constructor.details: This should initialize the default story to "Once upon a time "

params._content: the text associated with the StoryElement
params._dateTime: the date and time, in Moment.JS format, of publication

createStoryElement(string,string).notice: Initializes a new StoryElement struct and adds it to the story. This should populate the fresh struct with the given values.
